description: Care Everywhere Received Documents Audit contains a list of documents of a particular type received for a patient including the doc, request and message ids, instants, users, status, and contexts.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Received Document record ID.

columns.name: DOC_ID_AUDIT
columns.description: Document id received from the remote organization

columns.name: REQ_DOC_ID_AUDIT
columns.description: Document ID that was requested from the remote organization

columns.name: REQ_USER_AUDIT_ID
columns.description: User ID of the person requesting the document

columns.name: REQ_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:

columns.name: REQ_STA_RSN_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Code for document request status


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Patient authorization is required.


Patient is not participating in Care Everywhere at this organization.


The requesting user is restricted from making requests from this organization.


Unable to send document type.


Not sending document type.


Patient currently being merged.


Request missing CEID


Invalid CEID


CEID not found


Replaced CEID


Expired CEID


Requested document ID does not exist.


Requested document ID has been moved to another patient.


Restricted by Master Filter Rules


Restricted encounter


Provided demographics do not match.


Patient chart is undergoing maintenance. Please try again later.


Unable to find patient.


A request was made outside of a current visit.


Cross country document request rejected


Point of care authorization is no longer valid.


Requested document has been deleted


Payer Platform document request denied.


Patient is not participating in Payer Platform at this organization.


Patient Missing National ID


Patient chart is currently under review. Please try again later or contact the organization for assistance.


Patient is not participating in Non-Treatment exchange at this organization.


Document is too large to be sent.

Error in document build


Unhandled sharing level


Unknown patient


Unable to determine contact


Patient chart synchronization error.


Missing CEID Record


Patient chart synchronization timeout.


Unable to obtain lock on DXS record

ElectToRemove


IncorrectIdentity
